reviews.title: Average Hilton Standard

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night while visiting friends. My husband and I had lived in Milan for a year and a half so this would not have been our first choice had we wanted to book for convenience or price. However, because we are HiltonHonors diamond members, the room was booked with points, which meant it was free, we were upgraded to a junior suite upon arrival, were granted free Internet access and access to the executive lounge. We found this service to be superb. Our suite was very nice and typical U.S. Hilton standards. Very large, clean, and quiet with water and fruit provided upon check in. The executive lounge was top notch and reminded me of the British Airways lounge in Heathrow. The staff was wonderful and allowed us to check out late. The hotel is a convenient location if you are passing through Stazione Centrale, but it is not near to the famous sights of Milan. That being said, the sights are all easily accessible by tram or taxi. Would definitely stay again if we could book the room for free but I wouldn't pay my own money to stay here because I prefer a budget hotel when I'm paying.
reviews.title: superb, if you have Hilton honors diamond status

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel because it was convenient for the transfer bus from the airport and in that respect it did not disappoint. However all the main tourist sights are a metro ride away which is a bit of a nuisance if you want to pop back to your hotel during the day.
reviews.title: Good hotel but location not ideal for tourists

reviews.text: Because August is low season we got a really good rate on the room but as seems prevalent these days the hotel then charged extortionate prices for anything extra. We booked an Executive room with access to the Executive lounge and, albeit as a couple, easily recouped the extra cost through the free food and drink provided. I shudder to think what it would have cost in the bar downstairs.
reviews.title: Convenient for the station, comfortable

reviews.title: Very good hotel, fairly convenient location but not nicest part of town

reviews.text: There is nothing much wrong with the hotel just it is in the Business district rather than in the tourist area so if I was returning as a tourist I would maybe look elsewhere. For the business traveller it is ideal.
reviews.title: A solid Hilton, Great Lounge

description: Just 1 block from the Central Train Station and airport shuttle buses, the Hilton Milan boasts an Executive Lounge with an outdoor terrace, and wireless internet access throughout.All Hilton Milan hotel rooms offer wireless internet access. Step up from a Hilton Room to an Executive Room for Executive Lounge access. Enjoy appetizers at the Cosmopolitan Lobby Bar Lounge or dine on international and Italian favorites at the Hilton Milan hotel’s Pacific Milano Restaurant. There is fantastic shopping just 2 miles away and Milan attractions like the La Scala opera house are on the hotel's sightseeing tour. When you've explored the city, find peace at Lake Como, an hour away by train.
